title: Children of the Peloponnese
creator_credit: Via le Monde and Daniel Bertolino
brief_description: Depicts the life style of families in the central Peloponnese region on Greece concentrating on the children. Shows the long, arduous walk they must take each day to go to school in another village, schooling, aspects of culture and sex roles.
